title: 1960 USC Trojans baseball team
text:
The 1960 USC Trojans baseball team represented the <a href="University%20of%20Southern%20California">University of Southern California</a> in the <a href="1960%20NCAA%20University%20Division%20baseball%20season">1960 NCAA University Division baseball season</a>. The Trojans played their home games at <a href="Bovard%20Field">Bovard Field</a>. The team was coached by <a href="Rod%20Dedeaux">Rod Dedeaux</a> in his 19th season at USC.
The Trojans lost the <a href="1960%20NCAA%20University%20Division%20Baseball%20Tournament">College World Series</a>, defeated by the <a href="1960%20Minnesota%20Golden%20Gophers%20baseball%20team">Minnesota Golden Gophers</a> in the championship game.
